overview: Peter was a lonely boy who was mocked by his classmates for his glasses. When he found a pair of magical red glasses his life turned upside down. He met new friends, like the Pig and the Three-Headed Dragon, and started a wonderful, yet dangerous journey to the headquarter of the Game Creator, the World's most powerful video game developer. They believe he is the only one who can help the fairy tale heroes to survive by turning them into a video game character. "The Game Creator" is a unique take on a Broadway-style musical blockbuster performance.
title: The Game Creator
